scripts.build:all: npm run build:fr && npm run build:en
scripts.build:ingest: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192; ng build ingest --prod --base-href=/ingest/ --deploy-url=/ingest/ --i18n-locale fr
scripts.build:archive-search: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192; ng build archive-search --prod --base-href=/archive-search/ --deploy-url=/archive-search/ --i18n-locale fr
scripts.build:referential: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192; ng build referential --prod --base-href=/referential/ --deploy-url=/referential/ --i18n-locale fr
scripts.build:pastis: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096; ng build pastis --prod --base-href=/pastis/ --deploy-url=/pastis/ --i18n-locale fr
scripts.build:collect: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192; ng build collect --prod --base-href=/collect/ --deploy-url=/collect/ --i18n-locale fr
scripts.analyze-identity: ng build identity --stats-json --prod --i18n-locale fr ; webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/identity/stats-es2015.json
scripts.analyze-referential: ng build referential --stats-json --prod --i18n-locale fr ; webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/referential/stats-es2015.json
scripts.analyze-ingest: ng build ingest --stats-json --prod --i18n-locale fr ; webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/ingest/stats-es2015.json
scripts.analyze-archive-search: ng build archive-search --stats-json --prod --i18n-locale fr ; webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/archive-search/stats-es2015.json
scripts.analyze-collect: ng build collect --stats-json --prod --i18n-locale fr ; webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/collect/stats-es2015.json
scripts.i18n:identity: ng xi18n identity --outputPath=src/locale --i18n-locale=fr && xliffmerge --profile projects/identity/xliffmerge.json fr en
scripts.i18n:ingest: ng xi18n ingest --outputPath=src/locale --i18n-locale=fr && xliffmerge --profile projects/ingest/xliffmerge.json fr en
scripts.i18n:archive-search: ng xi18n archive-search --outputPath=src/locale --i18n-locale=fr && xliffmerge --profile projects/archive-search/xliffmerge.json fr en
scripts.i18n:referential: ng xi18n referential --outputPath=src/locale --i18n-locale=fr && xliffmerge --profile projects/referential/xliffmerge.json fr en
scripts.i18n:pastis: ng xi18n pastis --outputPath=src/locale --i18n-locale=fr && xliffmerge --profile projects/pastis/xliffmerge.json fr en
scripts.i18n:collect: ng xi18n collect --outputPath=src/locale --i18n-locale=fr && xliffmerge --profile projects/collect/xliffmerge.json fr en
scripts.check:demo: npm run lint:demo && npm run build:demo
scripts.check:portal: npm run lint:portal && npm run test:portal && npm run build:portal
scripts.check:identity: npm run lint:identity && npm run test:identity && npm run build:identity
scripts.check:referential: npm run lint:referential && npm run test:referential && npm run build:referential
scripts.check:archive-search: npm run lint:archive-search && npm run test:archive-search && npm run build:archive-search
scripts.check:collect: npm run lint:collect && npm run test:collect && npm run build:collect
scripts.publish:portal: cp projects/portal/package.json dist/portal/package.json && npm publish dist/portal/
scripts.publish:identity: cp projects/identity/package.json dist/identity/package.json && npm publish dist/identity/
scripts.publish:ingest: cp projects/ingest/package.json dist/ingest/package.json && npm publish dist/ingest/
scripts.publish:pastis: cp projects/pastis/package.json dist/pastis/package.json && npm publish dist/pastis/
scripts.publish:collect: cp projects/collect/package.json dist/collect/package.json && npm publish dist/collect/
scripts.publish:archive-search: cp projects/archive-search/package.json dist/archive-search/package.json && npm publish dist/archive-search/
scripts.publish:referential: cp projects/referential/package.json dist/referential/package.json && npm publish dist/referential/
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:portal &&  npm run publish:identity  && npm run publish:referential && npm run publish:archive-search && npm run publish:collect  && npm run publish:pastis && npm run publish:ingest
scripts.package:identity: mkdir -p dist/identity/ && cp projects/identity/package.json dist/identity/package.json && npm pack dist/identity/
scripts.package:archive-search: mkdir -p dist/archive-search/ && cp projects/archive-search/package.json dist/archive-search/package.json && npm pack dist/archive-search/
scripts.package:portal: mkdir -p dist/portal/ && cp projects/portal/package.json dist/portal/package.json && npm pack dist/portal/
scripts.package:collect: mkdir -p dist/collect/ && cp projects/collect/package.json dist/collect/package.json && npm pack dist/collect/
scripts.package:ingest: mkdir -p dist/ingest/ && cp projects/ingest/package.json dist/ingest/package.json && npm pack dist/ingest/
scripts.package:pastis: mkdir -p dist/pastis/ && cp projects/pastis/package.json dist/pastis/package.json && npm pack dist/pastis/
scripts.package:referential: mkdir -p dist/referential/ && cp projects/referential/package.json dist/referential/package.json && npm pack dist/referential/
scripts.package:all: npm run package:portal &&  npm run package:identity  && npm run package:referential && npm run package:archive-search && npm run package:collect  && npm run package:pastis && npm run package:ingest
